title: Troubles are multiplying: Population decline and economic deterioration stack up/Riches are scared
description:
#Chinainsights#Chinanews
A professor at Nankai University and the vice president of the China Population Society said on September 11, 2023, that more than 30 million Chinese men can’t find wives in their own country. Why is this?
